title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 478.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 478.1 - Policy

State Regulations

To promote a cooperative employer-employee relationship
between the division and its members, it is the policy of the division to
establish and provide for the settlement of disputes through an orderly
grievance procedure. For members who are represented by an employee
organization, such procedure shall be prescribed by the terms of the collective
agreement covering the negotiating unit of such member. Other members of the
division excluded from any negotiating unit may address their grievances, in
writing, to the superintendent or his designee. Determinations by the
superintendent shall be reviewed by the Governor or his designee upon the
written request of the member. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

478.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
